## ℹ️ About

These apps are designed for teaching **Econometrics** concepts interactively:  

- 📈 Instrumental Variables  
- 🧮 Standard Errors & Clustering  
- 🎲 Monte Carlo Simulation Evidence  

The source code is openly available on  
[GitHub](https://github.com/felixnoth/Shiny-Econometrics).
